title: Interaction Error with LightGBM

labels.name: todo
labels.description: This issue had an outstanding action to take.

body:
I am seeing that the following works fine: 

shap_values=explainer.shap_values(X)

but 

shap_valuesINT =explainer.shap_interaction_values(X)

produces the following error:

Any sense of what could cause this issue?
---------------------------------------------------------------------------
ValueError                                Traceback (most recent call last)
<ipython-input-23-2c339fe9b80d> in <module>()
----> 1 shap_valuesINT =explainer.shap_interaction_values(X)
      2 #explainer.shap_values(X)
      3 shap_valuesINT

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in shap_interaction_values(self, X, tree_limit, **kwargs)
    247             if self.model_type == "lightgbm" and self.trees is None:
    248                 tree_info = self.model.dump_model()["tree_info"]
--> 249                 self.trees = [Tree(e, scaling=len(tree_info)) for e in tree_info]
    250 
    251             if str(type(X)).endswith("pandas.core.series.Series'>"):

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in <listcomp>(.0)
    247             if self.model_type == "lightgbm" and self.trees is None:
    248                 tree_info = self.model.dump_model()["tree_info"]
--> 249                 self.trees = [Tree(e, scaling=len(tree_info)) for e in tree_info]
    250 
    251             if str(type(X)).endswith("pandas.core.series.Series'>"):

~/anaconda3/lib/python3.6/site-packages/shap/explainers/tree.py in __init__(self, tree, normalize, scaling)
    432                             self.children_default[vertex['split_index']] = self.children_right[vertex['split_index']]
    433                         self.features[vertex['split_index']] = vertex['split_feature']
--> 434                         self.thresholds[vertex['split_index']] = vertex['threshold']
    435                         self.values[vertex['split_index']] = [vertex['internal_value']]
    436                         self.node_sample_weight[vertex['split_index']] = vertex['internal_count']

ValueError: could not convert string to float: '2||4||5||6'
